<p class="lead">
	<strong>Doh</strong> is an documentation generator that uses a simple folder structure and Markdown files to create custom documentation on the fly. It helps you create great looking documentation in a developer friendly way.
</p>

<hr/>
<h3>Features</h3>
<hr/>

<img alt="[application thumbnail]" class="app-thumbnail pull-right"
     src="[% links.images %]app-thumbs.png">

* 100% Mobile Responsive
* Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown
* Auto created homepage/landing page
* Auto Syntax Highlighting
* Auto Generated Navigation
* 4 Built-In colour themes or roll your own
* Functional, Flat Design Style
* Shareable/Linkable SEO Friendly URLs
* Bootstrap classes on the markup
* No Build Step
* Git/SVN Friendly
* Google Analytics
* Optional code float layout

<div class="clear"></div>
<hr/>
